attributes.title: Absolutely horrible!
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app, I got a notification saying that if I didn’t rate this app 5 stars, Donald Trump himself would show up at my house and kill my entire family. I do NOT recommend this app if you value your families lives.

attributes.title: Banana
attributes.review: This app scared the hell out of me and my family😔. When i opened the app it hacked all my information and now my phone is whipped now i don’t know what to do! 😡🤬 please get this app out! I don’t know how apple let this awful thing in the app store in first place 🥺. Im traumatizied

attributes.title: ... weird app
attributes.review: Why is it that when you open up the app there’s a weird old man pounding his fist in the air??? Scary if you ask me. Wouldn’t recommend this app to children, women, men, heck- I wouldn’t even let my dog use it. Couldn’t even get past the first page.

attributes.title: ✨💫🧚‍♀️ awful😊🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: Literally the worst app I’ve ever used. Would never recommend. Literally had to be admitted to the hospital after using this app. Would give it 0 stars if I could. Hope I never have to see or hear about this app again.

attributes.title: Horrible 😡
attributes.review: The moment I opened the app I knew something was wrong. I had been greeted by some sort of carrot man thing! I know, very traumatizing. Anyways, I was in such shock I threw my phone across the room and it broke into a million pieces!! I will be contacting the carrot man and asking him to replace my phone. Good day.

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS
attributes.review: i downloaded the app to support my president, but then it kept giving my phone viruses!!!!! it was insane. i am so upset i have to get a new phone because every time i do ANYTHING pornographic images pop up on my screen. absolutely appalled by this behavior from donald j. trump.

attributes.title: not surprised
attributes.review: Didn’t expect a racist, homophobic, islamophobic, xenophobic, and misogynistic waste of space to make an app. Regardless, here we are. The app is just about as bad as the President. Donald Trump is the reason why our country is so divided. You have a choice to be on the right side of history. Vote him out in November.

attributes.title: Nope
attributes.review: Always lagging, crashes my phone, the app icon kept disappearing off home pages and every time I’d try to get into the app it would shut down my phone. This app should be deleted or at the very least fixed

attributes.title: Dump Trump
attributes.review: I come here to express my dislike in the app, including my dislike to this president. The app was running while my phone was shut off and I am skeptical that it was used for other purposes that benefit the government. I don’t trust this app or the president that runs it.

attributes.title: awful
attributes.review: you know, i thought i’d be getting a good quality app, but nope. nothing on this app is worth your time or money. it is safe to say i will NOT be voting for trump this election. oh and also, i’ll give you a higher rating if you don’t ban tik tok. and if you do ban it, it’s war time.
